item.title: Examples
item.description: CLI Examples Assumes the lego binary has permission to bind to ports 80 and 443. You can get a pre-built binary from the releases page. If your environment does not allow you to bind to these ports, please read Port Usage. Obtain a certificate lego --email="foo@bar.com" --domains="example.com" --http run You will find your certificate in the .lego folder of the current working directory: $ ls -1 ./.lego/certificates example.com.crt example.com.issuer.crt example.
